studyMetadata.title: Visualization Study
studyMetadata.description: A study to test the empirical effectiveness of truncating the y-axis of bar charts.

config.title: Average Monthly Temperatures for Country H

response.prompt: Select the option that orders the months from highest to lowest average temperature.
options: Nov, Jan, Dec, Feb, Oct, Mar, Apr, Sep, Aug, May, Jul, Jun
Feb, Oct, May, Apr, Mar, Sep, Jan, Jul, Nov, Aug, Jun, Dec
Sep, Feb, Apr, Dec, Jul, May, Mar, Jan, Oct, Aug, Jun, Nov
Jun, Jul, May, Aug, Sep, Apr, Mar, Oct, Feb, Dec, Jan, Nov

correctAnswer.answer: Jun, Jul, May, Aug, Sep, Apr, Mar, Oct, Feb, Dec, Jan, Nov
